title: "Philips to Expand its Cardiac Diagnostics and Monitoring Portfolio with the Acquisition of Cardiologs"
excerpt: "Royal Philips (NYSE: PHG; AEX: PHIA), a global leader in health technology, today announced that it has signed an agreement to acquire Cardiologs, a France-based medical technology company focused on transforming cardiac diagnostics using artificial intelligence (AI) and cloud technology."
